relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Everything you can think of from basketball, hockey, and cheerleading to bowling, and sailboating.
All kinds but especially business and culinary.
As long as I have been there, I absolutely love it!
Many clubs, associations, and sports. Also on campus activities,.
They cater at their orientations! I couldn't believe it!
I do not stay in a dorm.
Do not hesitate to meet with an advisor. It is a faster program than most schools. No worries about putting your schedule together.
A very clean environment, with the most up to date technology. Also, everyone is very friendly. They truly do care about your future.
pageTitle: Robert Morris University Illinois Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {20654=For culinary, the tuition can go up to at least 1000 dollars if not more. You also have to pay your books separately which could bring your tuition up even more., 6195=I visited the college and learned a lot that I'm sure would benefit me and my career. I plan to attend this University in July or September. Still dwelling but I'm going to attend this year. My major will be Culinary Arts. Cooking is my passion., 176057=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 123578=Robert Morris was my first choice since i was in 8Th grade, I enjoy the acceleration program. So far I have finished my Associates degree in Interior Design, and now I am working on my Bachelor's degree in Architecture technology, which I will be finishing in the spring 2013.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Great for someone that enjoys hands on and love to creative, imagine, explore, learn, advance, and become acquit with working in the industry you plan to major in.
